column4: blackbone, not really, but you could try recovery software (it may work)
recovery software for ubuntu? do you have a name for me?

not off the top of my head sorry, you will need to google for it. There does exist several Live CD distros for exactly that purpose, you might be able to recover it by replaying your filesystem journal if you use a journaling filesystem but don't quote me on that
ciclo thanks, off I go to find some sort of recovery softare for GNU/Linux
